name: The Foxglove Catcher
description:
The Foxglove Catcher README.txt

A young man falls down a cavern, into a different world.

The Foxglove Catcher is a Yume Nikki Fangame made in RPG Maker2k3 for Dream Diary Jam.  Game is still a big WIP, you can explore a few worlds and collect 4 effects (NPCs coming soon)  _(:3\ 

Devlog / updates will be posted on tumblr (+ lmk if you find any bugs!)

CONTROLS

[ z ] interact/confirm

[ x ] menu/cancel

[ shift ] effect action

[ ↑ ] [ ↓ ] [ ← ] [ → ] movement

[ F4 ] full screen
